name: Bedroom Tales
description:
Bedrom Tales was our final college project, it's called the Big Game and lasts for one year.

The project was awarded the first place for best game play, best 3D art and third place in popular vote.

The game in the rogue like style takes place in the room of two brothers battling in a game to decide who will get the new toy. The player will control Robi, the younger brother's favorite toy, swap parts and win the challenges created by the older brother!
